name: growl
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Growls cutely to reduce the foe’s ATTACK.
flavor_text.emerald: Growls cutely to reduce the foe’s ATTACK.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user growls in a cute way, making the foe lower its ATTACK stat.
